input_args.passage: 'Old-earth or young-earth belief | CMI takes the stand that the creation is thousands of years old, based on straightforward acceptance of the chronology in Genesis.'
input_args.claim: 'Then, from and, we can deduce that this organization, like Carl Wieland himself, supports the young-earth creationist view, which posits that the earth was created in six literal (24-hour) days 6,000–12,000 years ago.'
